name: Mad City Reloaded Two Islands
description:
You will have to make different decisions which decide the fate of two large, densely populated islands using a language of strength where groupings will help you.

Features:
- Excellent graphics
- A huge open world with two picturesque islands
- A huge number of unbearable missions
- Collateral missions of cargo transportation
- Atmospheric audio accompaniment
- The atmosphere of presence and immersion in the gameplay
- After spending time at the bar you will have unusual adventures
- You can find a girlfriend at any time of the day.
- Optimization for various devices
- Convenient operation

- A variety of cars of different classes (from passenger cars to trucks)
- A large weapon stores all over the city, where you can buy any weapon you want
- Unpredictable opponents
- Interesting characters
- Gangs with whom you can make friendship and manage the city, or you can be at enmity capturing the advantage.

The plot of the game:
The main character buys an excellent house almost for free on the island together with his friends away from high-rise buildings and city noise. It seems to be the island of prosperity and civilization, an island of new opportunities. But there's no such thing as a free lunch.
The mayor of this city has decided to build a bridge and connect two islands. This bridge is a point of delivery and sale of drugs, weapons and illegal immigrants. The policemen are in the lobe with them, they do not make any decisions and wait until you fall into the mess. You need to eradicate the rival making friends with new gangs, both with small and large, possessing an impressive reputation
